General.Name: Alkhaleej Training & Education Co
General.Description: Al Khaleej Training and Education Company offers training services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company's Computer segment offers advanced programming, networking, and computer solutions to individuals and corporates. Its Language segment provides training courses in English language. The company's University Projects segment offers educational projects to universities and the Ministry of Education, as well as operates orientation years for Saudi universities. Its Management Projects segment provides development courses, such as management, leadership, stock trading, and other certifications to trainess. The company's Smart Link segment provides management and operating services for customer service centers through telephone, as well as the digital technologies means for a number of Government and private companies. Its Schools segment operates private educational schools for boys/girls. The company also offers training solutions for women hairdressers, beauty salons staff, students, cosmetic consultants, nutritionists, and fitness specialists through Formul'A Academy. In addition, the company provides lifeboat and fast rescue boat training, as well as information technology training. Further, it offers manpower and human resources to call centers and customer care services. Additionally, the company is involved in the establishment and construction of schools and cafeterias; installation of networks; and provision of infrastructures, communication systems, operation and maintenance, and computer software, as well as call centers and technical support services. It also provides franchise rights to various brands. Al Khaleej Training and Education Company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: 30 A, Al Olya street, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
